# Math

Helpful atomic math functions, can be required() individually.

## Usage

cherrypick required functions, eg:

```
var fromComponents = require('math-js/vectors/fromComponents');
```

## Angles

### degreesToRadians

### radiansToDegrees

## geometry

### pythagoreanEquation

## numbers

### greatestCommonDivisor

### isNatural

### isPowerOfTwo

## vectors

### add

### fromComponents

### toComponents

### scale
